title: Baldurs Gate Trilogy - Total Happiness
description:
Modpack Description:

 Total happiness - Adds mods that fit with the existing game content/could have been part of the game. Bigger additions are left out.

Instructions:

1. Find the file "baldur.ini" in the main game directory and edit following entries to match your extraction path:

	HD0:=C:_cacheBGBaldur's Gate Trilogy - Total Happiness
	CD1:=C:_cacheBGBaldur's Gate Trilogy - Total Happinessdata
	CD2:=C:_cacheBGBaldur's Gate Trilogy - Total Happinessdata
	CD3:=C:_cacheBGBaldur's Gate Trilogy - Total Happinessdata
	CD4:=C:_cacheBGBaldur's Gate Trilogy - Total Happinessdata
	CD5:=C:_cacheBGBaldur's Gate Trilogy - Total Happinessdata
	CD6:=C:_cacheBGBaldur's Gate Trilogy - Total Happinessdata

   Make sure the "data" at the end of the CDx lines is left there.

2. Run "setup-widescreen.exe" and follow the on-screen instructions.

3. Run "setup-generalized_biffing.exe" and follow the on-screen instructions.
   I recommend to biff all files, so in-game stuttering is eliminated or reduced.

4. (optional) Run "BiG World Clean-Up.bat" to save a about 2GB of drive space.

5. Enjoy!


Notes on the setup process:

 Big World Fixpack commited on 2013-12-01 was used. (https://github.com/omni-axa/BiG-World-Fixpack)
 Big World Setup released on 2013-11-29 was used. (https://bitbucket.org/BigWorldSetup/bigworldsetup/downloads)

Following errors have come up during setup:
 
 1. BWFixpack Patch failed:
	:: banterpack - Banter Packs v13
	:: White Agnus' Viconia BG2 dialogue in BG1 fix
	:: http://forums.pocketplane.net/index.php/topic,26135.0.html

 Banter Pack v14 is used, maybe patch is obsolete? Haven't run into problems yet.

 2. 1pp component failed to install:

	NOT INSTALLED DUE TO ERRORS 1ppv4: Spell tweaks

 Should not be a problem, since the same changes are applied by the "spell_rev" mod (http://forums.gibberlings3.net/index.php?showtopic=24746&view=findpost&p=204677)
